item.title: The Future Of Bitcoin Smart Contracts
item.description: The future of bitcoin smart contracts https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1043419056492228608 Hey guys, next talk in 5 minutes. In five minutes. Introduction Hello everyone. If you’re walking, please do it in silence. I am a bit nervous. I was too busy organizing this conference and didn’t get time for this talk. If you had high expectatoins for this presentation, then please lower them for the next 20 minutes. I was going to talk about the traditional VC models and why it doesn’t work in the bitcoin industry.
